title: Types of field from magnet and loop

content.prompt: A bar magnet moves toward the center of a loop of wire, as shown above. Which of the following statements correctly describes the magnetic fields from the bar magnet and the loop as the magnet moves toward the loop?

choices.label: The bar magnet and the loop both create monopole fields.
The bar magnet creates a monopole field and the loop creates a dipole field.
The bar magnet creates a dipole field and the loop creates a monopole field.
The bar magnet and the loop both create dipole fields.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
